content.title: DEVELOPMENT OF HANDICRAFTS
content.beneficiary: Rural poor and artisans in Puducherry
content.details: The government of Puducherry takes the initiative to revive the vanishing crafts and restore the significance of traditional crafts. The objectives include promoting and developing handicrafts, reviving vanishing crafts, and creating better employment opportunities.
benefits: Financial assistance to trainees and trainers
Stipend of Rs. 1,500 per month for trainees
Honorarium of Rs. 300 per month for trainers
Compensation for wastage of raw materials
eligibility: Should be a native of Puducherry Union Territory or a continuous resident for the past three years
Proof of residence: Birth Certificate / Education Certificate / Residence Certificate
Already trained candidates are not eligible to apply
content.application_process: Offline. Applications are invited through advertisements in local daily newspapers. Applicants must apply in the prescribed form directly to the General Manager, District Industries Centre, Pondicherry.
documents_required: Birth Certificate / Education Certificate / Residence Certificate

faqs.question: What is the Scheme Development of Handicrafts?
faqs.answer: The objective is to revive the vanishing crafts and restore the significance of traditional crafts.

faqs.question: What is the age criteria to apply for the Scheme?
faqs.answer: The age should be 18 to 35 years of the beneficiaries.

faqs.question: When to apply for the Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Scheme will be advertised in the local Newspapers.

faqs.question: Is there any specific period of training?
faqs.answer: Yes, the training period is 6 months.

faqs.question: Is there any specific qualification required to apply for the Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, there is no specific qualification; any literate youth can apply.
